name: Good MOOrning
description:
Cow sadness has run amok on your humble cow farm. None of the cows are producing milk, they're too sad! You've decided to take it upon yourself to have a heart to heart with each of the cows in order to cheer them up..

This was a Global Game Jam Project made by the following members:

Team:

  • Programmers: Roger Smith, Jeremy Teal, Alex Coultas, Jasper Lyons
  • Artists: Mariah Kleinsmith (tablet broke, rip textures)
